content: Do 10 jumping jacks
Sing the alphabet backwards
Act like your favorite animal for 30 seconds
Do your best impression of a celebrity
Dance with no music for 30 seconds
Talk in an accent for the next 3 rounds
Do 20 push-ups
Call a random contact and sing 'Happy Birthday' to them
Eat a spoonful of a condiment
Let someone draw on your face with washable markers
Do a cartwheel
Speak in rhymes for the next 5 minutes
Post an embarrassing photo of yourself on social media
Do the worm dance move
Let someone tickle you for 30 seconds
Call your ex and tell them you miss them
Do a handstand for 30 seconds
Lick your elbow
Send a weird selfie to your parents
Go outside and shout 'I love pizza' five times
Do your best runway model walk
Eat a piece of paper
Let someone else post a status on your social media
Do 15 burpees
Pretend to be a dog for 2 minutes
Text your boss something funny
Do the floss dance for 1 minute
Hop on one foot for 30 seconds
Let someone give you a new hairstyle
Do a silly walk across the room
Sing everything you say for the next 10 minutes
Call a pizza place and ask if they deliver to Mars
Let the group give you a new name for the rest of the game
Do your best evil laugh
Wear your clothes backwards for the rest of the game
Call a random number and ask if their refrigerator is running
Do 25 sit-ups
Pretend to be a news anchor and report on what everyone is doing
Let someone draw a mustache on you
Go to the neighbors and ask for a cup of sugar
Do your best chicken dance
Eat something without using your hands
Post a video of yourself doing the Macarena on social media
Do the robot dance for 30 seconds
Let someone else do your makeup
Call a restaurant and ask what their WiFi password is
Do a magic trick
Wear socks on your hands for the next 15 minutes
Go live on social media and sing your favorite song
Do your best superhero pose and hold it for 30 seconds
Let someone crack an egg on your head
Do a yoga pose for 1 minute
Speak only in questions for the next 5 minutes
Do your best opera singing
Let someone else choose your profile picture for a week
